MSGF.NAME: RF0022MF
MSGF.TEXT: Rapid Fire files are not journaled

MESSAGE.MSG: ! ! ! The Rapid Fire files are not journaled ! ! !
The Raid Fire files are not journaled. Probaly you unchecked the button
"Start journaling Rapid Fire files" when you transfered the Rapid Fire library
to the host. In general you do this, if you have installed a high avaibility
solution like MIMIX, iTERA, BUS/400 or others on your system and this high
avaibility solution shall be responsible for the journaling of the Rapid Fire
files. If this is the case, then please check, why your high avaibility
solution has not journaled the Rapid Fire files. In all other cases start the
journaling of the Rapid Fire files by executing the following command.
